text: Neil Joshua Pearson (born 27 April 1959) is an English actor. He is known for his roles as Dave Charnley in the Channel 4 comedy series Drop the Dead Donkey (1990–1998), Tony Clark in the BBC One police drama series Between the Lines (1992–1994), Michael Caddick in the BBC One drama series All the Small Things (2009), Vaughan Fitzgerald in the BBC One school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2014–2015), and Jonathan in the BBC One drama series In the Club (2014–2016). His film appearances include all three of the Bridget Jones films (2001–2016). He is also an antiquarian book dealer who specialises in the expatriate literary movement of Paris between the World Wars. == Other websites == * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London
